string.text: Get Next Task
Receive your next task.
What? Oh, yes, great! Stalker, I need you to help one of my colleagues. Go to him quickly! He needs you!
Good luck stalker.
Sakharov Research Documents
Some of Professor Sakharov’s research papers were left behind when his scientist fled from a mutant attack. Retrieve the documents and return them to Sakharov.

Ah, yes, I’m glad you’re here. One of my researchers just returned from the field. He had to abandon his notes after being attacked by mutants. He is terrified to go back there. I need that research, stalker. Please retrieve it for me, I will gladly compensate you for your trouble.
Thank you stalker! Please, take this as your payment.
Find %s Sample for Sakharov
Find a sample of the %s artefact and bring it back to Sakharov so he can research it.
Ah, yes, good! I have been expecting you. I am in need of an experienced artefact hunter to find a sample of a particular artefact for me.

I am researching the Anomilis Strugatskus, commonly known as %s. Find one for me and I will gladly reward you for it. You will need to take this detector with you, it will help you in locating the artefact.
Yes, good, good! Now my research can begin! Thank you stalker. You have done well.
Search Lab X-18
Professor Sakharov needs the research documents contained within Lab X-18 in Dark Valley.

Oh, yes. Good! I have an important job for you. Important research was conducted in Lab X-18 but we have been unable to gain access to analyze it. Do you think you can try to retrieve it for us? I will pay you well if you can.
Excellent! Thank you stalker!
Raise Funds To Become Ecologist
Sakharov wants me to raise 17,000 RU to help the Ecologists if I want to join them.

Ah, well, we don’t normally recruit stalkers to become Ecologists. However, we just happen to currently be in a bit of a bind. We are running out of funding for our current research project. We need at least 17,000 RU to keep it going. If you are willing to raise the money for us, you can join our camp.
Wonderful! Excellent! Thank you! Please, make yourself at home here, fellow Ecologist.
Semenov Research Hunt
Assistant Semenov has contracted you to escort him around the local area to kill mutants so that he can retrieve fresh tissue samples and analyse the corpses with his scanning equipment.

Would you mind helping me kill some mutants so that I can take readings and tissue samples? Let’s say… About five different mutants. I’ll be putting my life in your hands and you would need to ensure my safety. I will compensate you for your efforts.
Thank you for your assistance, friend. I have all the tissue samples I need. Here is your payment… Come back and see me again some time.
%s Tissue Sample for Sakharov
Sakharov needs a tissue sample from a %s.
I need an experienced stalker or a mutant hunter. Is that somebody you?
I need to collect tissue samples from a %s. I don’t care how you get it, just make sure it’s fresh. Get here A.S.A.P. as soon as you recover what I need from the mutant.
Thank you, sir. This will help immensely in my research.
Pick up Psi-Helmet
Professor Sakharov has agreed to recalibrate the psi-protection helmet. He asked you to come back to pick it up in a couple days.
Disable the Miracle Machine
The Miracle Machine prevents stalkers from travelling between Yantar and the Dead City. Disabling it will require advanced psi-protective equipment.
